taunt.name: Taunt
taunt.description: Taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack Axe

enrage.name: Enrage
enrage.description: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to be slowed and take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends

buff.description: Enraged (slowed and taking damage over time)

counter.name: Axe Spin
counter.description: When attacked, there is a chance to immediately counterattack all enemies around

buff.description: When attacked, there is a chance to immediately counterattack all enemies around

ult.name: Chop
ult.description: Axe hits the enemy aiming for the neck. If enemy HP is below 1/3 the head will be chopped and the skill can be used again

summon.name: Summon Image
summon.description: A copy of Terror will be summoned to do his biddings, with half his HP and damage

mirror.name: Mirror of Erised
mirror.description: Invokes dark reflections making all enemies around will receive their own damage

morph.name: Demonic Morph
morph.description: Transforms Terror and all images into powerful demons with a ranged attack

ult.name: Soul Exchange
ult.description: Terror will swap his soul with the target enemy, swapping all their HP

aoe.name: Let'em come
aoe.description: Turns the enemy numbers against them, dealing bonus damage per unit and extra bonus per hero

heal.name: Horn Blow
heal.description: Purge the target unit and grants bonus damage and heals

buff.description: Damage increased and healing per turn

counter.name: Counter Attack
counter.description: When attacked, there is a chance to immediately counterattack with lifesteal

buff.description: When attacked, there is a chance to immediately counterattack with lifesteal

ult.name: Challenge
ult.description: Exchanges three attacks with a target enemy. If anyone dies, the killer gains permanent bonus damage

stun.name: Rope Shot
stun.description: Ties the target to an enemy unit or tree behind it. If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is halved

arrow.name: Power Arrow
arrow.description: Damages enemies and destroys trees along its path. For each enemy the arrow hits, its damage is reduced

run.name: Wind Runner
run.description: Increases the movement speed and adds evasion from all attacks

buff.description: Movement speed increased and evasion from all attacks

ult.name: Rain of Arrows
ult.description: Attack a target enemy four times in a row. Damage is lightly reduced.

star.name: Starfall
star.description: Damages all enemies around the Cat Lady. One random enemy will be hit twice

arrow.name: Swift Arrow
arrow.description: Stuns and damages a single target. The distance will increase the damage and the stun (Max Dmg 15, Max Stun: 4 turns)

leap.name: Cat Leap
leap.description: Jump to the target spot and receive bonus speed

ult.name: Keen Shadows
ult.description: All player heroes will become invisible

fire.name: Dragon Flames
fire.description: A column of flames damages enemies in a line

stun.name: Fireball
stun.description: A ball of fire stuns and damages enemies in target area. Can destroy trees

passive.name: Soul on fire
passive.description: Each cast will increase attack stacking fire bonus damage. Reset on turn end

buff.description: Each cast will increase attack stacking fire bonus damage. Reset on turn end

ult.name: Zap
ult.description: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit

burn.name: Mana Burn
burn.description: Every attack has damage bonus equal to target's mana and makes the enemy discard a right hand skill card of that hero

buff.description: Damage increased by the target's mana and makes the enemy discard a right hand skill card of that hero

mirror.name: Spell Mirror
mirror.description: Mirrors magic back to casters and after first activation will passively increases magic resistance

counter.description: Mirror spells back to the caster

ult.name: Mana Blast
ult.description: Damage target area with bonus damage equal the target's mana. Interrupts target channel

slow.name: Snow Blast
slow.description: A burst of damaging frost that slows enemies in the target area

passive.name: Mana Aura
passive.description: Give a bonus skill card per turn

buff.description: Player buys one extra skill card per turn

freeze.name: Ice Prison
freeze.description: Prevents movement and attack while dealing damage over time. Interrupts target channel

buff.description: Ice Prison: disarmed, rooted and receiving damage over time

ult.name: Ice Storm
ult.description: Channels a storm of icy explosions that deals damage and slows enemies around her

source.description: Let it go! Let it go!

targets.description: Slowed and damaged by icy explosions

illuminate.name: Light Ball
illuminate.description: Channels light to damage enemies in a line

channel.description: Channeling light to damage enemies in a line

blind.name: Light Blast
blind.description: Knock back and blind enemies, causing them to miss 70% attacks. Interrupts target channel

ult.name: Light Wisp
ult.description: A peaceful wisp of light puts all enemies to spleep.

bear.name: Summon Bear
bear.description: Summon a Bear with 'Defender', 'Nature claws' and 'Demolition'. Gains 'Return' card. Deals 12 damage on death

source.name: Defender
source.description: Transfer a portion of the damage dealt to the Druid to his bear

source.name: Demolition
source.description: Increases the power of the Bear, causing it to deal 6 extra damage to the tower

source.name: Nature Claws
source.description: Attacks have a 20% chance to cause roots to burst from the ground, immobilizing the attacked enemy unit, and dealing 6 damage per second. Interrupts target channel

target.name: Nature Claws
target.description: Rooted and receiving damage per second

bearreturn.name: Return
bearreturn.description: Teleports the Bear back to the Bear Druid. Must be discarded if the bear is killed

link.name: Bear Link
link.description: Increases the attack and the Bear Druid damage heals his bear

buff.description: Attack increased and lifesteal heals bear

roar.name: Fearful Roar
roar.description: Roars causing enemies to flee in terror. Unit retreats one spot if the position is free. Interrupts targets channel

ult.name: Bear Form
ult.description: Bear Druid morphs himself into a raging bear with increased HP and armor. Gains 'Battle Roar' card

cry.name: War Claws
cry.description: Increases the attack and armor of Syllabear and the Spirit Bear

stun.name: Rock Wave
stun.description: Rock spikes burst along a straight path, hitted enemies are stunned and take damage

burn.name: Mind Burn
burn.description: Deals damage according to opponent's mana multiplied and makes enemy player lose a card of that hero

spike.name: Carapace
spike.description: Reflect damage received and stun the source of damage

buff.description: Reflect damage received and stun the source of damage

ult.name: Burrow
ult.description: Mix becomes invisible and gains bonus speed and damage

hook.name: Meat Hook
hook.description: Launches a hook that will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit and dealing damage if enemy. Interrupts enemy channel. Damage blocked by Black King Bar

rot.name: Stink
rot.description: A stink cloud that deals damage and slows enemies. Damage is dealt at the turn end, Butcher will also be damaged

passive.name: Meat Armor
passive.description: Gives Butcher bonus HP and damage on every kill and reduces magic damage

buff.description: HP and attack increased per kill and bonus magic resistance

ult.name: Fresh Meat
ult.description: Disable and deals damage over time while healing himself. Interrupts target channel

target.description: Disabled and receiving damage over time

stun.name: Fire Blast
stun.description: Damage and stun a target then slows and deals damage over time

aura.name: Vampiric Aura
aura.description: Grants attack lifesteal. Every attack will heal by a percentage of the damage

crit.name: Mortal Strike
crit.description: Dead King attacks will have a chance of inflicting critical damage bonus. If a unit is killed with critical damage, player buys one 'Skeleton' card

buff.description: Chance of critical damage. If a unit is killed with critical damage, player buys one 'Skeleton' card

ult.name: Reincarnation
ult.description: Dead King will come back on next player turn after being killed slowing enemies around. The passive is discarded

source.description: No one can kill the Dead King!

targets.description: Slowed by the return of the King!

aura.name: Vengeance Aura
aura.description: An aura that increases the attack damage of nearby friendly units. If Venge dies, damage bonus will double

ult.name: In my Shoes
ult.description: Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy

passive.name: Untouched
passive.description: Attacker's will be cursed and suffer reduced damage for the turn

curse.name: Seduction
curse.description: Summon a forest creep, takes control over an enemy unit or slow an enemy hero

heal.name: Healing Wisps
heal.description: Invoke 5 Healing Wisps for herself and nearby friendly units

ult.name: Spear of Missing
ult.description: Attack a target enemy with bonus damage equal to twice the distance
